description.lang: The HS-PA100+ plug-in is a non-dimming switch which plugs into a standard AC outlet, and allows remote control of On, Off lights and AC operated appliances. Compact design allows second wall AC outlet to remain free.Serves as a node to repeat the signal in the network, extending the overall Z-Wave mesh wireless network rangeThe HS-PA100+ uses the latest 500 series Z-Wave chip for longer range, over-air-firmware update, and easier inclusion process, providing these features are also supported by the gateway or controller.
